paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Tech-Savvy Legal Guidance
detailsData.content: Deep understanding of technology saves time and money. Acronyms and jargon don't scare us.

detailsData.title: Client Involvement
detailsData.content: Clients remain involved and put to work. Every minute you put in saves you money.

detailsData.title: Problem Prevention & Resolution
detailsData.content: Hands-on legal guidance for startups and businesses. Mitigation, negotiation, and litigation services.

address: 3245 University Ave., Suite 1245, San Diego, California 92104
valueProp: T.C. Johnston, LL.M. Internet Law provides hands-on legal guidance on Internet and technology issues such as online business disputes, trademarks, copyrights, Internet torts, and more.

testimonalData.text: T.C. Johnston provided excellent legal advice for our tech startup. Highly recommended!
